titleInfo.title: Merle Haggard and Ray Griff at the Opera House (Nov 27) (18260)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Merle Haggard Show with Ray Griff at the Opera House on November 27. Poster features metal photoplates of Merle Haggard and Ray Griff. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22836.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
